overview: See the rise, the danger and the fight against the life-threatening crystal meth. In 2020 no fewer than 32 methamphetamine labs were rolled up in the Netherlands, while they were hardly found two years earlier. Rick shows how devastating these drugs are. He has been addicted for twenty years. There is also an answer to the question: what do Mexican cartels have to do with production in the Netherlands?
title: Breaking Meth
